sbp.client.forwarder module¶

class sbp.client.forwarder.Forwarder(source, sink)[source]¶

Bases: threading.Thread

The Forwarder connects an iterable source of incoming SBP messages to a callable sink of outgoing SBP messages. The source will typically be a Handler which provides queueing and message filtering. The Forwarder runs its own thread iterating over the source messages and delivering them to the sink. The thread is run in daemon mode and will be destroyed when the main thread exits, or the source stops iteration.

source
: iterable of tuple(SBP, dict)
Source of SBP messages.
sink
: callable (SBP, **metadata)
Callable sink of SBP messages.
run()[source]¶
stop()[source]¶
